title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 2-Ga - Extrajudicial consent (birth or legal parent - private-placement - step-parent)

2-Ga

COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of the Adoption of (Docket)
(File) No. A Child whose First Name is
EXTRAJUDICIAL CONSENT
(Birth or Legal Parent -
Private-Placement-
Step-parent)
________
1. I,, residing at, am the (birth) (legal) parent of. I do
hereby consent to the adoption of my (daughter)(son), born on
by[specify name]:, adoptive parent. 2. the name and last known address of the
other (birth)(legal) parent of the adoptive child are:[FN1]
Dated: ________
/
_________________________
(b). The adoptive parent(s) (has)(have)
(no) knowledge of any criminal record concerning themselves or any other adult
residing in the household (except)
/

name/signature

number

STATE OF NEW YORK): ss.: COUNTY OF)

On this day of 19,, the person who
executed the foregoing instrument, personally came before me and acknowledged
that (he) (she) executed the same. ______________

inapplicable

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
